自己尝试Chrome创意广告

Sep 29, 2013
1 minute read

之前看到日本关于Chrome的广告非常棒（看广告点这里），所以写了script玩玩。

 1 <!DOCTYPE html>
 2 <html>
 3     <head>
 4         <script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.10.0.min.js"></script>
 5 
 6         <script type="text/javascript">
 7             var max = 330;
 8             function openTabs() {
 9                 for (i = 1; i < max; i++) {
10                     openURL("http://www.google.co.jp/landing/motto/tabplay/" + i + ".jpg");
11                 }
12                 window.close();
13             }
14 
15             function openURL(URL) {
16                 var a = $('[]()');
17                 var evt;
18                 if (document.createEvent) {
19                     evt = document.createEvent("MouseEvents");
20                     if (evt.initMouseEvent) {
21                         evt.initMouseEvent("click", true, true, window, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, false, false, false, 1, null);
22                         a.get(0).dispatchEvent(evt);
23                     }
24                 }
25             }
26         </script>
27 
28         <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html" charset="utf-8" />
29 
30         <title>Chrome广告实现</title>
31     </head>
32     <body>
33         <button onclick="openTabs();">打开图片</button>
34     </body>
35 </htm>

不得不说这个对性能要求挺高的，如果速度太慢就很难看到不错的效果。

chrome html javascript
